NAEB TAPE NETWORK

Series 53-6 (Winter-553)
Titles OLD BOOKS: OLD FRIENDS
Types Talk
Times 30:00
No®s 13 programs
Origin: WGBH
Audiences General
These half-hour talks include readings from books that have been
"Old friends" to the people who talk about them.
